name: 多變量分析專題（一）
description: 本課程介紹運用於分析多變量資料時常用的統計方法。內容包括主成份分析、因素分析判別分析、群集分析、多變量變異數分析等主題。
goals: 認識多變量分析方法的理論基礎
進行資料分析應用實務
能利用統計軟體進行資料分析
syllabus:
1: Matrix Algebra and Random Vectors

2: Sample Geometry and Random Sampling

3-4: The Multivariate Normal Distribution

5-6: Inferences About a Mean Vector

7-8: Comparisons of Several Multivariate Means

9-10: Multivariate Linear Regression Models

11-12: Principal Components

13-14: Factor Analysis and Inference for Structured Covariance Matrices

15: Canonical Correlation Analysis

16:  專題報告

17,18: 學生自主學習與探究
